review: Read the below reviews for more indepth analysis, but i will say this: KF1 was a simple game that worked amazingly well. KF2 manged to ♥♥♥♥ it all up in one fell swoop. aside from pretty graphics there is nothing that KF2 does better than KF1. If you're thinking of buying this, dont. Buy KF1
